title: Set blank tooltip in chart title causes exception when previewing
description: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, it causes an exception when previewing.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, an exception occurs when previewing.
EB: When previewing a chart with a blank tooltip set in the title, an exception is thrown.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a blank tooltip in the chart title.
2. Preview the chart and observe the exception that occurs.
